Content.Text:
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't <PARENT> here yet? We've been waiting sooo
loooong...
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL><PARENT> is gonna be home soon. I just know it!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yaaay! <PARENT>'s home!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<PARENT>! ♪

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heeeeeey, welcome back!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Yeah! Home is better than work, <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, guess what! Today, <CHILD_NAME_W> and
me went outside and caught bugs!
<PAGE>
Heh heh...I totally caught the most. ♪

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hmph! I'll catch more next time!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, at least I'm not gonna get so caught up
chasing one bug that I fall into the river and get
soaked!
<PAGE>
Mama got really mad about that.

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, at least I'm not gonna get so caught up
chasing one bug that I fall into the river and get
soaked!
<PAGE>
Papa got really mad about that.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey! That was suppos'ta be a secret!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why? Mama already said she's gonna tell
<PARENT> all about it later.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeaaaah, but...

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why? Papa already said he's gonna tell <PARENT>
all about it later.
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Yeah, but...
That sounds like fun!
That was dangerous.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really? You aren't mad at me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Heehee! You're awesome, <PARENT>! I love you
lots! ♪ I guess I should still be more careful
though, huh?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmph! <PARENT> always goes easy on you,
<CHILD_NAME_M>.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah! I know! Let's race back home! Last one
there has'ta do more chores!
<PAGE>
Ready...GO!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wah! No fair! Wait for me!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I know...it was dangerous and I could've gotten
hurt. I'll be more careful next time. Promise.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heehee!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<PARENT>, guess what, guess what! I was a good
girl aaaall day! Isn't that great?

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee hee! I love you, <PARENT>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Me too! I love you too, <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! I know! Let's race all the way home!
<PAGE>
Whoever wins gets to play upsy-daisy with
<PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
But...what if <PARENT> is first?

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ummmmm....

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah! Then you and me will both play upsy-daisy
with <PARENT>!

<FACE_CHILD_G><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Umm...we can't lift <PARENT> up, even together.

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ummm...ummmm...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Okay! We'll both give <PARENT> a biiiig hug! How
'bout that?
<PAGE>
Oh! And a shoulder massage, too!

<FACE_CHILD_B><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yeah! That's a great idea! Everybody
ready...set...GO!
